award_title: Collaborative Research: CAIG: Reliable Generative Downscaling for Geoscience Data
subject: Making your downscaling framework stick around
body:
Hi Yixin,

You're doing great work on generative models for weather dataâ€”and you'll probably end up fielding a lot of follow-up emails asking for code, or fielding requests to run it on new datasets.

Ouro lets you turn that into a single callable endpoint. Once it's up, researchers just hit an API instead of emailing you. Your methods stay accessible, you stay sane.

Worth a quick conversation?

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
